sub_rules.content: Any of the standard "block tags" that are used appear in the order @param, @return, @throws, @deprecated,
sub_rules.formalization: block_tag.@param, block_tag.@return, block_tag.@throws, block_tag.@deprecated must be arranged in the given order

sub_rules.content: and these four types never appear with an empty description
sub_rules.formalization: (block_tag.@param ∨ block_tag.@return ∨ block_tag.@throws ∨ block_tag.@deprecated).description must contain character

sub_rules.content: When a block tag doesn't fit on a single line, continuation lines are indented four (or more) spaces from the position of the @.
sub_rules.formalization: the quantity of continuation_line_tag.indentation must be greater than or equal to @.indentation + 4
